item.title: Episode 4: REV IT UP on 05-Nov-2014
item.description:
I like the music SAM played at the beginning, so I kept it in: it is unlisted in the following playlist.
Screaming Queens - Diet-Psychadelia Baptists - Dissembler-Bloodmines Scott Walker + Sunn O))) - Brando-Soused Arca - Now You Know-Xen SOPHIE - Hard-Numbers Phantom Head Trip - Shade-Shade Suicide - Diamonds, Fur Coat, Champagne-Suicide II Mirror - City Lights-Mirror Martin Rev - Gloria-Stigmata
item.itunes:subtitle: Barbie + Suicide

item.title: Episode 3: Third Times The on 22-Oct-2014
item.description:
This is the first episode podcasted because this is the first episode that is not terrible.
Swans - Oxygen(Edit)-Oxygen EP 18+ - All the Time-Trut Dan Bodan - A Soft Opening-Soft James Ferraro - COB-COB EWE OF NOW RECORDING - Camo Tapes-Batch 1-Family Album Maharadja Sweets & Seth Graham - Space is the Place...For TV-The Cassette Label Heads Who Went Outside Kyle Bobby Dunn - Ghostkeeping Verses-Kyle Bobby Dunn and the Infinite Sadness SOPHIE- Lemonade-Lemonade Architecture in Tokyo - MIMOSA (ft. スーパーセックス永遠にSUPERSEX420)-Architecture in Tokyo Chevalier Avant Garde - KILLING FIELDS (Nite Mix)-REALIGN Neu Balance - Restate (Alternate Version)-Restate Jesse Lanza - Strange Emotion-Pull My Hair Back
item.itunes:subtitle: Chanel + Nissan

item.title: CANADA DAY SPECIAL
